reviewText: The box was right but the DVD wasn't.  Returned item, never got a replacement.  Not sure if I got a credit on my card or not.
Well, anyways, they say is shadow dancing, and that is what it is. Maybe is ok, but not thrilling. I bought it to project it in a party and it was a good wall "decoration" but nothing to die for...

I had purchased this video KNOWING what it was.  I was excited that I could afford it but I regretted the purchase afterward.  As a DJ, I wanted to use this on a projector or on a video display as used at other clubs on mute.  Purchasing the video means needing to get the Amazon video software and viewing is ONLY POSSIBLE on the software.  The format is 4:3 and there are NO options to change the aspect ratio.  Enlarging the display only worsened the quality.  There is potential here to re purchase the video, as it itself is all to be expected; his decision rides solely on the improvement of the Amazon Video player.
Used it for xmas eve party really got the party going was very impressed,lots of people asked where i got it.
Super cheesy; AWFUL gay/male dancers (which I didn't think was supposed to be the case). The screen itself had a few flaw's in color; but overall it is a riot and everyone laughed.
If you own a bar a must have for the ladies night!
